items.title: JSW Energy shares crack 5% after CERC rejects proposed tariff for SECI project
items.description: CERC has cited that the tariff proposed by JSW Energy for the SECI project signed in January 2023 is much higher than what has been discovered in recent auctions.

items.title: Green Channel Route via CCI: Challenges in streamlining M&A approvals
items.description: The Green Channel route introduced to expedite M&A approvals has become less effective due to stricter interpretations and complex new rules. The CCI should reconsider changes to foster a more business-friendly and efficient regulatory environment for non-problematic transactions

items.title: Pre-earnings updates of banks signal a fall in credit off-take
items.description: Growth in personal loans has fallen off the cliff, while growth in gold loans has surged

items.title: FMCG company Marico's commentary on margin pressure weighs, shares down over 2%
items.description: During its third quarter business update, Marico said on January 3 that rising input costs may result in a higher-than-anticipated margin contraction, compared to a year ago. This may be due to the management's focus on expansion of the consumer franchise, said the company.

items.title: Standard Glass Lining Technology IPO: An opportunity to play the specialised engineering solutions theme?
items.description: Strong market positioning, a diversified product portfolio, strategic prospects and a proven financial track record

items.title: Markets in 2025 – Bears versus bulls, who will have the last laugh?
items.description: Market valuation and history suggest the possibility of a double-digit return in 2025

items.title: Rs 25,000 crore PLI scheme for electronic components on cards this Budget
items.description: After the approval from the Finance Ministry, MeitY is expected to seek Cabinet approval, post which the scheme is likely to be announced in the upcoming Union Budget 2025.

items.title: ITC: Demerger to improve return profile for the existing business
items.description: Proposed reorganisation will optimise cost structure and aid profitability

items.title: FMCG Q3 preview: Steady execution to drive volumes amid sticky high inflation
items.description: With improving rural performance, companies with diverse growth avenues will outperform peers

items.title: Post-Adani exit, Wilmar to emulate ITC; leverage cash-cow oil business to expand FMCG portfolio
items.description: Just as ITC used its strong cigarette business to expand into FMCG, AWL is set to use its dominant edible oil business as a foundation for FMCG growth

items.title: Aero India's next edition in February, foreign tie ups and Make in India on agenda
items.description: Promotion of Indian start-ups will be another focus area at Aero India 2025, said the MoD statement. It is also expected that leading defence PSUs may reveal further details of some of their leading and pioneering projects to interested overseas buyers.

items.title: Vivek Ramaswamy's Strive Asset joins the crypto rush with plans for a Bitcoin Bond ETF
items.description: Papers file by Strive Asset before the SEC have proposed a fund to invest in derivatives like swaps and options in order to take exposure into convertible securities by MicroStrategy or other such companies that are planning to purchase Bitcoins.

items.title: Regulator CEA asks states to seek private capital for $107 billion transmission grid expansion
items.description: States should monetize their transmission assets by transferring ownership to businesses for a period of time, and re-invest the proceeds into new projects, according to a report by the Central Electricity Authority.
